name: dont shoot! a fish in a barrel
name_original: dont shoot! a fish in a barrel
description:
Made in 3 hours!

You've been sentenced to the barrel, make sure you have a good life before your death by eating as much food and scoring as high a score as possible before you get shot or too much water flies out the barrel! (i just remembered I forgot to make it so you die when the barrel is empty)

Controls:

- click and use mouse to move around

- press space to patch up holes

Assets: sourced from around the web
